      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0031001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0031001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Concepto de clonación</string>
            <string language="en">The concept of cloning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Konzept des Klonens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le concept du clonage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O conceito do cloning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il concetto di clonazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έννοια της κλωνοποίησης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica el concepto de clonación, enumerando los tipos de clonaciones, es decir, clonación acelular (PCR), clonación celular, clonación de células y clonación de organismos completos.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the concept of cloning, listing the types of cloning, that is acellular cloning (PCR), cellular cloning, cell cloning and cloning of complete organisms.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">clonación</string>
            <string language="en">cloning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches das Konzept des Klonens, Listen die
Typen des Klonens erklärt, das acellular Klonen (PCR), zellulares 
Klonen, Zelle Klonen und Klonen der kompletten organismen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant le concept du clonage, liste les 
types de clonage, qui est le clonage sans formation cellulaire (PCR), 
le clonage cellulaire, le clonage de cellules et le clonage des 
organizations complètes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica o conceito do cloning, lista 
os tipos de cloning, que é o cloning acellular (PCR), cloning 
celular, cloning da pilha e cloning de organismos completos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega il concetto di clonazione, 
elenco i tipi di clonazioni, che sono clonazione acellular (PCR), 
clonazione cellulare, clonazione delle cellule e clonazione degli 
organismi completi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί την έννοια της κλωνοποίησης, που 
εμφανίζει λίστα τους τύπους κλωνοποιήσεων, οι οποίες είναι 
acellular κλωνοποίηση (pcr), κυψελοειδής κλωνοποίηση, 
κύτταρο που κλωνοποιούν και που κλωνοποιούν των πλήρων 
οργανισμών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klonen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">clonage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cloning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">clonazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλωνοποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
